command.text: declare @$none nvarchar(512), @vcID varchar(33), @vcDate smalldatetime, @isLocked tinyint select @vcID = stt_rec, @vcDate = ngay_ct from kkyc with(index(so_ct)) where so_ct = @so_ct and ngay_ct between @ngay_ct1 and @ngay_ct2 if @vcID is null begin select @$none = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Không có yêu cầu kiểm kê theo điều kiện đang lọc.' else N'No data matching filter condition.' end select 'so_ct' as field, isnull(@$none, '') as message end else begin select @isLocked = case when @vcDate <= ngay_ks_kk then 1 else 0 end from dmstt select '' as field, '' as message, 'on$Filter$Retrieve$QueryComplete(this, ''' + @vcID + ''', ''' + isnull(convert(varchar(10), @vcDate, 111), '') + ''', ' + str(@isLocked) + ');' as script end

script.text: function init$PhysicalCountQtyUpdate$(a){a.getItem("so_ct")._idle=9}function active$PhysicalCountQtyUpdate$(a){a.add_onResponseComplete(on$PhysicalCountQtyUpdate$ResponseComplete);a._looking=a.getItem("so_ct")._controlBehavior;a._looking.add_loading(on$InventoryLookupFilter$Before$Loading);var b=a.getItem("ngay_ct1");b.focus();a.live(b)}function close$PhysicalCountQtyUpdate$(a){try{a._looking.remove_loading(on$InventoryLookupFilter$Before$Loading)}catch(b){}try{a.remove_onResponseComplete(on$PhysicalCountQtyUpdate$ResponseComplete)}catch(b){}}function on$PhysicalCountQtyUpdate$ResponseComplete(c,a){var c=a.object,d=a.type.Context,e=a.type.Result;switch(d){case"Checking":var b=c.grid;b._voucherNum=c.getItemValue("so_ct").toUpperCase();b._alterTitle=[null,[["%s",b._voucherNum,true]]]}}function on$InventoryLookupFilter$Before$Loading(c,f){var b=c._element.parentForm;if(!b.validFields("ngay_ct1")||!b.validFields("ngay_ct2"))f.type.cancelEvent=true;else{var g=b.grid,h=g.get_element().parentForm,d=b.getItemValue("ngay_ct1"),e=b.getItemValue("ngay_ct2");a=[{Name:"d1",Type:"DateTime",Value:d},{Name:"d2",Type:"DateTime",Value:e}];c.set_memvars(a)}}function on$Filter$Retrieve$QueryComplete(b,d,e,c){var a=b.grid;a._denyNew=a._denyEdit=a._denyDelete=c;a._voucherID=d;a._voucherDate=e;if(c==1)a._denyMessage=b._language=="v"?"Đã khóa số liệu, kiểm tra lại ngày khóa sổ.":"Data is locked, you must modify system locked date."}
